lyrics:
Hebrew
Hebrew script
Translation



Hebrew
Ken, ken, ze shuv mitnagen
Zemer shir yashan noshan
Shenichtav mechadash bishvilcha
Ashir oto lecha
Veshuv onim kinorot
Af ani kmo meitar
Sheno’ad lemangina achat
Hamangina shelcha
Yashiru hashamaim
Ahava hi shir lishnayim
Ha’olam kulo tsochek elai veshar
Kama tov, kama tov
Yashiru hashamaim
Ahava hi shir lishnayim
Ki shiri hu hashir shelcha
Ken, ken, ze shuv mitnagen
Zemer shir yashan noshan
Shehayom po bishnaim nashir
Bishnaim nashir
Ki hashir lo nigmar
Tamid hu yushar, tamid
(Yashiru hashamaim)
(Ahava hi shir lishnayim)
Ha’olam kulo tsochek elai veshar
Kama tov, kama tov
(Yashiru hashamaim)
Ze ole veholem kmo tupim shebalev
(Ahava hi shir lishnayim)
Im hazemer haze
Ha’olam kulo tsochek elai veshar
Kama tov, kama tov
Yashiru hashamaim
Ahava hi shir lishnayim
Ki shircha hu hashir sheli
